KCSResourceStore Class Reference

Inherits from NSObject
Conforms to KCSStore
Declared in KCSResourceStore.h

Overview

KCSResourceStore loads, creates/updates, and deletes blob resources from the Kinvey backend @deprecatedIn 1.18.0

Tasks

Adding/Updating

  • – saveObject:withCompletionBlock:withProgressBlock:KCS_DEPRECATED:

    Add or update an object (or objects) in the store.

Querying/Fetching

  • – queryWithQuery:withCompletionBlock:withProgressBlock:KCS_DEPRECATED:

    Query or fetch an resource (or resource) in the store.

Instance Methods

queryWithQuery:withCompletionBlock:withProgressBlock:KCS_DEPRECATED:

Query or fetch an resource (or resource) in the store.

- (void)queryWithQuery:(id)query withCompletionBlock:(KCSCompletionBlock)completionBlock withProgressBlock:(KCSProgressBlock)progressBlock KCS_DEPRECATED

Parameters

query

A string filename.

completionBlock

A block that gets invoked when the query/fetch is “complete”.

progressBlock

A block that is invoked whenever the store can offer an update on the progress of the operation. @deprecatedIn 1.18.0

Discussion

Query or fetch an resource (or resource) in the store.

This method takes a NSString filename object or NSArray of string filenames and fetches them from the resource store.

Declared In

KCSResourceStore.h

saveObject:withCompletionBlock:withProgressBlock:KCS_DEPRECATED:

Add or update an object (or objects) in the store.

- (void)saveObject:(id)object withCompletionBlock:(KCSCompletionBlock)completionBlock withProgressBlock:(KCSProgressBlock)progressBlock KCS_DEPRECATED

Parameters

object

A url to a file to add/update in the resources (if the object is a NSArray, all objects will be added/updated). The object must be a NSURL that points a local file, or a NSArray of such NSURL objects.

completionBlock

A block that gets invoked when the addition/update is “complete” (as defined by the store)

progressBlock

A block that is invoked whenever the store can offer an update on the progress of the operation.

@deprecatedIn 1.18.0

Discussion

Add or update an object (or objects) in the store.

This is the basic method to add or update resources.

Declared In

KCSResourceStore.h
